law.full_text:
DEFINITION.
For the purpose of this Article 11 the term “newsletter or mass mailing” shall mean identical or nearly identical pieces of mail in an amount which exceeds 200 pieces, but does not include a form letter or other mail which is sent in response to a letter or inquiry or an official mailing required by law.
law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
DEFINITION. (§ 49.61)
DEFINITION. For the purpose of this Article 11 the term “newsletter or mass mailing” shall mean identical or nearly identical pieces of mail in an amount which exceeds 200 pieces, but does not include a form letter or other mail which is sent in response to a letter or inquiry or an official mailing required by law.
law.html:
DEFINITION.

For the purpose of this Article 11 the term “newsletter or mass mailing” shall mean identical or nearly identical pieces of mail in an amount which exceeds 200 pieces, but does not include a form letter or other mail which is sent in response to a letter or inquiry or an official mailing required by law.

unit.text: DEFINITION. For the purpose of this Article 11 the term “newsletter or mass mailing” shall mean identical or nearly identical pieces of mail in an amount which exceeds 200 pieces, but does not include a form letter or other mail which is sent in response to a letter or inquiry or an official mailing required by law.
